character.statement: You're lucky we found you! And just in time for tomorrow's big hunt.
Nonsense. You shan't pass up an opportunity to hunt with the greatest big game hunter in the world!
Come to my trophy room if you're not convinced.
The master will receive you in the Banquet Room.
You must be lost. Back to the room you go.
There must be a key to this door somewhere...
That seems fragile. I should leave it alone for now.
I should go to the Trophy Room so I can get out of here.
This door won't budge. There must be a way to disable the security lock.
Van Buren wants me in the Banquet Room... I guess a quick bite couldn't hurt.
Drat, it must be keyed to Van Buren's voice!
I should try that voice recording I found.
